Module takMashido.shani
Package takMashido.shani.core.text

Class ShaniString.ShaniMatcher

java.lang.Object
takMashido.shani.core.text.ShaniString.ShaniMatcher
Enclosing class:
ShaniString
public class ShaniString.ShaniMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
An engine that performs match operations on a ShaniString. Warning: Not thread save, Some methods can give error when original ShaniString change after creation.
Author:
TakMashido

    • apply

      public ShaniString.ShaniMatcher apply​(ShaniString... comparables)
      Match given ShaniString[]. Equivalent to invoke apply(ShaniString) with each array element.
      Parameters:
      comparables - Array of ShaniString data which will be applied.
      Returns:
      this

    • apply

      public ShaniString.ShaniMatcher apply​(ShaniString comparable)
      Match given ShaniString.
      Parameters:
      comparable - ShaniString to be applied.
      Returns:

    • apply

      public ShaniString.ShaniMatcher apply​(java.lang.String data)
      Match given String. Equivalent to apply(new ShaniString(data))
      Parameters:
      data - String to be applied.
      Returns:
      this

    • exactApply

      public ShaniString.ShaniMatcher exactApply​(ShaniString... comparables)
      Do word based exact compare. Search for combination of words which are String.equals(Object) to given ShaniString.

      note: number of white characters is ignored, only the fact they exist end divide ShaniString value to words matters

      Parameters:
      comparables - ShaniString containing String values to be searched in underlying ShaniString.
      Returns:
      this ShaniMatcher object.

    • exactApply

      public ShaniString.ShaniMatcher exactApply​(java.lang.String comparable)
      Do word based exact compare. Search for combination of words which are String.equals(Object) to given ShaniString.

      note: number of white spaces is ignored, only the fact they exist end divide ShaniString value to words matters

      Parameters:
      comparable - String to find in underlying ShaniString.
      Returns:
      this ShaniMatcher object.

    • isEqual

      public boolean isEqual()
      Check if cost of compare is smaller then Config.senetenceCompareTreshold.
      Returns:
      If underlying ShaniString is equal to all applied data.

    • isSemiEqual

      public boolean isSemiEqual()
      Check if applied data are presented in underlying ShaniString. Skip unmatched words.
      Returns:
      Look above.

    • getUnmatched

      public ShaniString getUnmatched()
      Returns ShaniString containing all unmatched data.
      Returns:
      Look above.

    • getCost

      public short getCost()
      Returns minimum cost of comparison with ShaniString's given by apply(ShaniString) method.
      Returns:
      Comparison cost.

    • getMatchedCost

      public short getMatchedCost()
      Returns minimum cost of comparison with ShaniString's given by apply(ShaniString) method. Ignore unmatched words cost.
      Returns:
      Comparison cost.

    • getMatchedNumber

      public int getMatchedNumber()
      Counts number of already matched words.
      Returns:
      Number of matched words.

    • clone

      public ShaniString.ShaniMatcher clone()
      Creates semi-deep copy of Object. State of Matching(cost, lastPosition) are copied, but base ShaniString object stays the same.
      Overrides:
      clone in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      Semi-deep copy of object;
